title: Japan Server; why there is no english platform?
body: As a foreigner living in japan ( as many many others ) , I am facing a hard time playing lol in Japanese server because only  the Japanese language is available, Learning Nihongo is not an easy task, especially when it comes to Kanji ( the main alphabet), furthermore, the English platform will be welcomed by many Japanese summoners who used to play in NA and Eu servers or even for more fun English practice, and lot of other reason,so please riot consider this option for the server.

replies.body:
As *Breakordoom44* mentioned, since you're making a suggestion for a Region language change, I recommend posting this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where these types of posts go.

Let me know if you have any questions.
